rules_text:
When Dark Summoner enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Blight {2}{UB}{UB} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {2}{UB}{UB}. If you do, it enters under an opponent's control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose one–
• You lose 2 life.
• Discard a card.
